doctors.name: Dr. Diya Gupta
doctors.description: Dr. Diya is a highly dedicated and compassionate healthcare professional specializing in gyno. With a focus on patient well-being, they offer personalized care and advanced treatment options. Committed to excellence and continuous learning in the field of gyno health.

doctors.name: Dr. Rohan Verma
doctors.description: Dr. Rohan is a highly dedicated and compassionate healthcare professional specializing in neuro. With a focus on patient well-being, they offer personalized care and advanced treatment options. Committed to excellence and continuous learning in the field of neuro health.

medicines.name: Paracetamol

medicines.description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for pain and inflammation.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Used for pain, fever, and inflammation, also as a blood thinner.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: Broad-spectrum penicillin antibiotic.

medicines.name: Laxative

medicines.name: Probiotic

medicines.name: Eye Drops

medicines.name: Amlodipine

medicines.name: Atorvastatin

medicines.name: Metoprolol
